import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const DifficultyBar = ({}) => { const bsDifficultyCols = 'col-3 col-md-2 col-lg-2 col-xl-1' const path = window.location.pathname console.log('difficultybar: path:',path) return( <>
Select difficulty:
Beginner
Intermediate
Extreme
Custom
) } export default DifficultyBar
